channel.title: C21Media's C21TV
channel.description: C21Media covers the worldwide media and entertainment business, publishing a wide variety of programmes from inside this creative sector. From profiles of the people changing the face of digital media to in-depth interviews with top ranking creatives running the worlds channels, production companies and advertising agencies, get the inside track on the latest trends in screen-based entertainment.
